title: Ride
lyrics:
We ride this heartless road
I curse our song on the radio
We fly, we flick and float
Turning upside down in the afterglow
She said, oh

She don't know

Where I'll go

Where will I go



But I know

Know she knows

Every time

I tell her so



Oh, I have a coat to hold

Her head light and ready to go

Tonight, I wake, I know

We're calling out like we're never alone



She said, oh

She don't know

Where I'll go

Where will I go



But I know

Know she knows

Every time

I tell her so



I'll go

Where she goes

Every time

She tells me so
